title: Petition For Riot To Allow Us To Toggle Different Announcer Voices
body: I actually like Dark Star Thresh's voice

replies.body: http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/001/236/841/075.jpg
YERR MATES ARR FEEDIN' THE FISHES
AYE CAPT'N
I already have it manually installed.

So custom announcer packs still works, even with the new client, I take it? 
I've only installed a Leblanc VO mod myself - never looked too much into announcers (nor what is actually out there of custom ones).

Of course they do. Same file system.

To disable the Dark Star one, just be in game and use the sound settings (Doesn't appear in the In-Game section of the in client options)

>Of course they do. Same file system.

...You wouldn't happen to know where to put custom login screens in the new client as well?
Because those aren't where they used to be.

I haven't given it a whole-hearted go, but from what I have seen, I get a feeling the logins are server stored now. I surely hope not - I want my good old Quinn login back. :(
BARREL

{{champion:432}}  announcer back please

Triple kill: Toots

Penta kill: Toots intensifies
a single kill is a doot, a penta is a han zimmerman BWAAAAHHHMM

Aurelion Sol would be the perfect announcer.

"Pentakill? I'm almost impressed."

Depending on how your ally dies he could say ''a noob has been slain'', ''we have dead weight'', etc. there  is so much potential for his savagery as an announcer. Too bad Riot doesn't like good ideas, any other MOBA has custom announcers yet Riot doesn't do it.

Fun fact, i started playing hots and saw immediately that riot took the "stunned, rooted" pop ups from hots. 
Which honestly is unnecessary imo but ofc riot is unwilling to give us announcers.
Hard to not hear his voice when reading.
I WANT GP BACK! :DD
I mean, they have the custom announcer on/off buttons. Why don't they just make it a permanent option to toggle voices?
GANGPLANK

It'd be awesome to see them commission some "cult famous" actors/actresses for voice overs.  Some ideas to wet the appetite:

- Patrick Stewart
- Jonathan Frakes 
- John Cleese
- Sarah Michelle Gellar
- Jenna-Louise Coleman
- Claudia Christian
- Nathan Fillion
- Christopher Lambert
- Danny Trejo
- Steve Buscemi
- Samuel L. Jackson
- Kurt Russell
- The Rock
I'd pay for a Morgan Freeman one

I would pay money for Patrick Stewart to become the new announcer. I would chew off my own arm and offer it as tribute. Please, Riot.

Also, I hate the new announcer. Hate. It's terrible. I feel like I'm watching pro-wrestling with this non-sense.
Or Morgan Freeman.
Aha! darn, I was going to say Samuel Jackson XD.

Samuel would require them to create a voice profanity filter, because Samuel without saying motherfucker wouldn't be Samuel. Imagine his voice for first blood if your team gets it, ''that motherfucker is gonna have a rough time now'', so much potential. Also, Morgan Freeman should be in the game, too. 

PS: You can find Samuel and Morgan Freeman announcer packs on YT, a voice impersonator did it, it's very cool.

this is great 10/10 
{{champion:266}}

James earl jones anyone? 
"i find your lack of skill disturbing"
Would be great. DotA 2 has Rick and Morty so why not?
John De Lancie. All i want in life.
Half the community dosent even have sound open.
Almost positive they said they've no intention of doing this. I wish they would. I don't see the downside.
They don't accept good ideas, that's their problem.

Community: "other mobas have custom announcers!! plz i want the GP announcer!!!

Rito: "we already copied too much from Dota and Hots.
Didn't HoTS come out after LoL?

yes, but hots is based on games like starcraft, warcraft, diablo, and overwatch.
Riot basically copied concepts from warcraft and diablo.
Mordekaiser for exemple is a mashup between leoric (diablo) and arthas (warcraft)

the Dinamic Queue was implemented in hots before getting adopted by lol.
and then hots switched to solo queue and rito followed.
Well, LoL IS Chinese owned now. Stands to reason they only copy things instead of inventing them.

announcer packs have been requested in league for a long time

we already have
aurelion sol
alarak
gangplank
dark star thresh
why not riot

I'm actually kinda confused why they ***don't*** do more of these different announcers more often. If you look at Starcraft 2, Blizzard's got many different characters playing as announcers including Jim Raynor, Sarah Kerrigan, and Artanis. So why not have Riot be able to make different characters announce in games? I would LOVE to hear my main (Karthus) announce all my games :P

It's not like Riot doesn't have the tech, they currently have an option to turn OFF the DS Thresh announcer, which means they have the capability of switching audio files around for changing announcers. This means that potentially, Riot games could create a selection of different announcers in the future, like returning GP or DS thresh to to be available.

How long is gp announcer ago? Two years? 
And every once in a while it pops up that different announcer would be really  really fun. 
And riot just ignores that completely. 
Would love to hear gp once again.
why not be like other mobas and actually let you have multiple announcers?

> [{quoted}](name=Xilixer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AEatWNc2,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2017-05-07T06:44:52.531+0000)
>
> why not be like other mobas and actually let you have multiple announcers?

because if someone in the pro-scene had a different voice on than what they liked, it could give the other team an unfair advantage Kappa. :D

Your comment makes no sense and hopefully you're trolling. In case you aren't, if by any holy reason an announcer pack offers some ''advantage'', they can disable it in tournaments, there, problem solved.
He is trolling. Hence the "kappa" part

Here's the thing: They could team up with voice actors or YouTubers or whatever and then sell Announcer Voice Packs on the store for people who wanted a custom announcer.

I can think of a couple people I'd buy the pack for.

or not I guess...
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
i wouldn't mind if they put in a patch, where you can set the language to something else, for example: wanting to hear the champions in Spanish or German
isn't there a toggle option in sound or something?

You can toggle the voice in your sound options. Its only available while in-game (the client doesn't have it for some reason) and its located in the same are as changing the summoner's rift music.

If you mean permanently being allowed to toggle it and not just for the event, even though I don't like the voice I'm on board with this. (please bring back GP announcer)
This is going to be like the map skins to rito. They would keep having such a high standard for things that they forget that we just want something that works and is fun

it might be a fair idea for the shop too maybe?sell some of the new announcer voices?

dota 2 is doing it and it got pretty popular. using both champion and other game's characters voices.
Gangplank Announcer yes
I agree, love the dark star thresh announcer
